1.Alert: System Alert: Ship Course has been altered. Manual readjustments required.

2.Player: Huh. I wonder what happened… That's unusual. Usually the ship's AI would handle any problems… Guess I'll go fix it myself.

1.Alert: System Alert: Engine Power has been changed to low power. Manual readjustments required.

2.Player: Huh? That's odd. Issues don't usually occur more than once a week… Maybe it's just an off week… I guess I'll go handle it.

1.Alert: System Alert: Data System issues have been detected.

2.Player: Okay. The third time in a week… and one day after another. This can't be normal. Is someone playing a prank? They're taking things way too far… Well… Gotta fix this.

1.Alert: System Alert: Communications channel issues have been detected. Manual investigation required.

2.Player: …Someone is definitely doing these things intentionally… Is it really a prank? Let's see if I can catch them leaving the communications room…

1.Alert: System Alert: Oxygen Level changes detected. Manual readjustments required.

2.Player: (Speak of the devil… Whoever it is, this isn't just a prank anymore. This is intentional sabotage…)

3.Player: (No… There's no way anyone in the team would do this…)

1.Alert: System Alert: Power system issues have been detected. Manual investigation required.

2.Player: Who's doing all of this? Why would they try to sabotage our journey back home when we're so close…? I have my suspicions but… there's no way right?

1.Alert: System Alert: Air Filtration System issues detected. Manual investigation required.

2.Player: God… What the hell is that smell… Something is seriously wrong. After I fix this issue I'll go and talk [SUSPECT] and sort this all out.
